pages.fallback:
Mobs get stronger over time, based on each adventurer.

Mobs will spawn with higher health, damage, movement speed and with better armour and weapons.

Mobs spawned in different areas have special modifiers.

Some areas and biomes spawn different mobs than usual.

Mobs spawned in %s areas are slightly stronger.

Creepers have a higher blast radius and mobs don't drop their weapons and armour as often.

contents.fallback: Light Level 0, except in %s

pages.fallback:
Mobs spawned in %s areas are weaker, but faster.

Husks swarms can be found.

More mobs carry fire aspect and flame weapons.

Mobs spawned in %s are tougher to kill.

Drowned are faster as well.

Zombies spawned in %s areas have less health, but can respawn when killed.

Creepers will use Invisibility to sneak up to adventurers.

Slimes are larger and spawn more often.

Mobs spawned in %s areas are weaker, but spawn in groups.

Skeletons carry melee weapons.

Mobs can be found wearing projectile protection gear.

Mobs spawned in %s areas are stronger.

More mobs carry knockback and punch weapons.

Phantoms can be found here at night.

Drowned spawned in %s are much more powerful and more frequently carry tridents.

Guardians can be found here even outside of Ocean Monuments.

Mobs spawned in %s areas are slower, but have more health.

Many attacks will apply slowness.

Creepers are not found here.

Mobs spawned in %s areas are weaker, but apply weakness, hunger, and poison.

Spider clusters can be found.

Mobs can spawn with special gear.

Weapons have a 20% drop chance and armour has a 8.5% drop chance.

When dropped, the gear will have a powerful modifier.
The following modifiers can be found on weapons:

contents.fallback: - Less attack damage, but quicker attack speed

- Stronger attack damage, but has slower attack speed
- Knockback II-III
- Less attack damage, but has Fire Aspect III-V
- Has low base attack damage but will double total attack damage
- Deals damage to everything within 4.5 blocks
- Poisons attacked target
- Temporarily slows and weakens attacked target
- Reduces armor of attacked target for 10 seconds
- Shortly after hitting a target, they will be dealt heavy damage, attacking through armor and effects
- Reduced attack speed, but attacks grant bonus attack speed for 6 seconds

- Attacks apply lightning charges.
- 7+ charges cause a lightning strike
